H0.text: Strong odor helps some animals defend themselves against predators.

H1.text: Poor hearing is a characteristic that helps some animals defend themselves against predators.

H2.text: Weak eyesight helps some animals defend themselves against predators.

H3.text: Shivering is a characteristic that helps some animals defend themselves against predators.

A4.text: Skunks are notorious for their anal scent glands, which they can use as a defensive weapon.

A5.text: They have poor vision, being unable to see objects more than about 3 m (10 ft) away, making them vulnerable to death by road traffic.
